column2: "...Ugh, why did I say those words?"
"First I invite conversation, and then I turn it away. What was I thinking?"
"I'm such a hypocrite..."
"I'm sure to be hated. We'll never meet again! Sniff. Waaaaah--!"
"It's only natural!? Even you shudder from time to time!?"
"Shut up! At least you could encourage me! It's all your fault!"
"A-aah! Wha--!? Why are--? What're you--!?"
"1. I came to see you"
"2. Just passing by"
"You came to see me? After all I said? ...why?"
"Just passing by? This place is deep inside the forest!!"
"N-never mind! Whatever the reason, the fact is you're here. I have to say it!"
"Please forgive me. I said some terrible things."
"I thought... it would be easier to say goodbye, while we still shared some good memories."
"I didn't want you to come to hate me, or be afraid of me. But I wasn't thinking straight."
"I-I'm happy to see you! I really mean it! And here, of all places!"
"This is my favorite spot. It's beautiful, serene... and puts my mind at ease."
"I never thought anyone would find it. And yet, here you are."
"Teehee... say, what do you think about making this our meeting place from now on?"
"1. Understood."
"2. How about someplace else?"
"All right! It's a promise!"
"Huh? What's wrong with this place? I love it! Overruled!"
"Sheesh, okay, okay! I'll go! Quit badgering me!"
"...oh, that's right. I never asked your name!"

"<%me>...
<%me>...?
That's a neat name."
"I also have a name. Not Claris Claes, that's not my real name."
"Well, I'm Claris Claes for now, but I hope the time comes when I can use my own."
"<%me>...I'll catch you later."
